short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Onet Fruit Connect is a fun and relaxing HTML5 pair puzzle solving game.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
INTRODUCTION
Play Onet Fruit Connect on your Google Chrome Browser with our simple & lightweight extension - No Internet required, no ADS, and 100% Free!

HOW TO INSTALL?
1. Click "Add to Chrome" to install the extension
2. Pin the Onet Fruit Connect extension icon to the Chrome toolbar
3. Click the Onet Fruit Connect icon on the Chrome toolbar, the Onet Fruit Connect popup will open. 
That's all you need to do! Have fun!

HOW TO PLAY?
Connect 2 similar images with up to 3 straight lines
